column5: if anybody is around up there, just wondering how much snow you guys have and how are the lakes doing for ice with the cold week last week  I know the snow can be variable in different parts of the county, we are between Minden and Moores Falls  thanks
I'd also greatly appreciate an update; we're by Carnarvon but I fish most of the lakes from Minden to the Frost Centre
Made it out today in the Haliburton Lake area,3-5" of ice carried the atvs no problem.Only a couple bites and one 10" splake. Not much snow 6-8"
thanks IAC, sounds like more snow is coming today

some of the smaller lakes are starting to freeze up, but the bigger lake around canarvan are still wide open. i know mountian, 12mile, boshkung, halls lake and koshog are still wide open. i was out on 3 brother lake and it had 3-4" of ice on it.
Wait a couple weeks , better safe than sorry
